title: I really hope Bethesda doesn't f*ck up this new Fallout game...
body:
I'm not gonna sugar coat this Bethesda. Fallout 4 is complete sh*t. Creation club is sh*t. Literally everything you've done in the last few years sucks. This is your chance to redeem yourself. Prove to us you can actually make a good game for once that isn't loaded with microtransactions. No day one dlc, no loot boxes, or any other stupid sh*t.
